description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Explore Thunder Moon's cavernous alien landscape with your friends by foot, with jetpacks and by vehicle in this multiplayer sci-fi shooter sandbox! Fight creatures, craft items, build to the sky and much more in the vast world of Thunder Moon! Over 200 sci-fi themed block types with no vertical construction limits make this a unique block world experience!
